name: Suinov Strike
description:
Enroll yourself in a fast paced adventure through the winding ways of Suinov to protect your planet from Alien Invasion. Get your reflexes maxed because one wrong turn will get you in trouble...

-----------------------------------

STORY LINE:

You are air pilot 57, working for your planet Suinov's defense. Your planet is attacked by mysterious alien ships and are destroying it. You go on a life risking adventure to exterminate all the alien ships you can

-----------------------------------

Try to get as much points as possible

-----------------------------------

Use the arrow keys and WASD keys to move your ship and avoid the enemy ships and the terrain and use space to shoot

-----------------------------------

This is my second 3D game... hope you all enjoy it.

-----------------------------------
